Package com.isotrol.impe3.nr.api

Interface Summary
IsEmptyFlag The "is empty" flag.
IsNullFlag The "is null" flag.
NodeRepositoriesService Interface for a service providing multiple node repositories by name.
NodeRepository Interface to the node repository.
 

Class Summary
AbstractNodeRepositoryRequestAdapter Abstract NodeRepository to NodeRepositoryRequest adapter.
CachingNodeRepository A caching node repository decorator.
CategoriesCriteria Categories filter criteria.
ContentTypesCriteria Content types filter criteria.
EmptyNodeRepository A NodeRepository implementation with no nodes.
FilterCriteria<T> Node filter criteria implementation.
ISO9075 Implements the encode and decode routines as specified for XML name to SQL identifier conversion in ISO 9075-14:2003.
KeysCriteria Keys filter criteria.
LocalesCriteria Locales filter criteria.
Node Node definition.
Node.Builder Node builder.
NodeFilter Node filter.
NodeFilter.Builder Node filter builder.
NodeKey A repository node key.
NodeQueries Queries constructor helper.
NodeQuery The abstract base class for node queries.
NodeRepositoryRequest Object representing a node repository request.
NodeSort Encapsulate sort criteia for queries
NRBooleanClause Clause in boolean query
NRBooleanQuery Conditional query.
NRMatchAllDocsQuery Return all documents in repository query
NRRangeQuery  
NRSortField Define how to sort nodes.
NRStringQuery StringQueries will be parsed with lucene query parser.
NRTerm A search term.
NRTermQuery Match nodes containing a term.
NRWildcardQuery Wildcard query for two supported wildcards, '*' and '?'.
Schema Schem description.
SetsCriteria Sets filter criteria.
TagsCriteria Tags filter criteria.
Util Support methods for this package.
